[[inst_hl_ldi_u]]
==== HL.LDI.U

*Syntax:* hl.ldi.u [SrcL, simm], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_ldi_u.svg[HL.LDI.U encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/LONG
